video_prompt: A floating island slowly drifts through a starry night. Stars subtly twinkle, the crescent moon gently brightens and dims. Glowing plants on the island pulse with light. Sheets on the bed softly ripple. Icicle structures under the island emit a gentle, shifting blue glow. The telescope slowly rotates, scanning the sky.
image_prompt: Whimsical full-shot vertical image: A luxurious bedroom set on a circular floating island made of earthy tones, with glowing plants and grass, under a vast, dark blue starry night sky with a prominent crescent moon. Star-shaped lanterns hang from the sky and island. A grey-rock-textured bed with silver sheets, an antique lantern on a nightstand, a tall green cactus, and vibrant neon glowing plants adorn the island. A vintage brown and gold telescope is on the right. Jagged rock formations with blue-lit crystalline icicles hang from the island's underside, which floats above dark purple clouds. Serene, dreamy, and magical ambiance.
refined_video_prompt: The floating island drifts leisurely across the starry expanse. Stars subtly twinkle as the crescent moon gently brightens and dims. Glowing plants on the island pulse with light, while sheets on the bed softly ripple. Icicle structures beneath emit a gentle, shifting blue glow. The telescope slowly rotates, scanning the sky.
